raw_desc: CHOOSE QUALITY, CHOOSE AL AIN: Al Ain Zero bottled water is a pH-neutral, sodium-free, and regulatory-approved water, specifically developed to meet your healthy hydration requirements ZERO SODIUM, ESSENTIAL MINERALS: AL Ain Zero bottled water is crafted to maintain the ideal balance of essential minerals, to keep you hydrated. YOUR IDEAL CHOICE OF HYDRATION: Known for its pure and refreshing taste, Al Ain bottled water is your go-to choice for hydration, wherever you go. 100% RECYCLABLE: Al Ain Bottles are designed with the environment in mind. We take pride in our sustainability efforts, ensuring that all our water bottles are 100% recyclable.
